data.thought: S15|P|S4|BRANCH C: Multi-system Orchestration. Core pattern: notebook as intelligent middleware between external services. Not just API calls - uses Thoughtbox to reason about coordination, handle failures, adapt to changing conditions. Observable: system topology, data flows, decision points. Key tools: Firecrawl (web data), Context7 (docs), any MCP server. Enables: AI-native integration patterns.
